alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 8:55AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern West Feliciana, West Baton Rouge, east central Pointe Coupee, northwestern Livingston, East Feliciana and East Baton Rouge Parishes through 945 AM CDT... At 854 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of New Roads to 6 miles northwest of Port Allen to near Addis. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Port Allen, Jackson, Clinton, Oak Hills Place, Addis, Brusly, Slaughter, Wilson, Westminster, Watson, Pride, Shenandoah, Greenwell Spring, Old Jefferson, Merrydale and Inniswold. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 144 and 167. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
